mapper.insert:
insert into base_product_style
pid, name, code, long_code, value, is_leaf, level, sys_code, creator, gmt_create, modifier, gmt_modified, is_deleted, att1, att2, numa1, numa2, remark,
#{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{longCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{value,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isLeaf,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sysCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{att1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{att2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{numa1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{numa2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.select:
select
from base_product_style where 1=1 and code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and long_code like CONCAT(#{longCode_,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, "%")

select
from base_product_style where long_code like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{longCode}),'%')
select id from base_product_style where pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT
FROM base_product_style bps WHERE bps.pid=(SELECT DISTINCT bps2.id FROM base_product_style bps2 WHERE bps2.numa2 =#{functionId} )

SELECT HOUSETYPE.id AS houseType, BASE.id AS baseProductStyleId, BASE.numa2 AS orgHouseType, BASE.name AS styleName FROM base_product_style BASE, (SELECT id FROM base_product_style B WHERE B.pid = (SELECT id FROM base_product_style B WHERE B.code = "root2")) AS HOUSETYPE WHERE BASE.pid IN (HOUSETYPE.id) OR BASE.id IN (HOUSETYPE.id)
SELECT bps.name FROM base_product_style bps WHERE bps.id = #{designRecommendedStyleId} AND bps.is_deleted = 0
